settings.chooseWalletForDna: Choose the wallet associated with your DNA registration:

settings.dnaRegistrationDesc: This section displays information about DNA registrations linked to your selected wallet. DNA (Distributed Name and Address) is your unique identifier within the CPUNK ecosystem.
settings.noDnaFound: No DNA registrations found for this wallet.
settings.canRegisterDna: You can register a new DNA using the CPUNK platform.
settings.socialAccountDesc: Linking your social accounts to your DNA profile strengthens your identity within the CPUNK ecosystem and enhances your proof of humanity. Verifying multiple platforms further boosts your credibility and community presence.
settings.permanentConnections: Once linked, these connections are permanent and cannot be changed or removed.
settings.connectAdditionalAccounts: Want to connect additional social accounts?
settings.connectWeb3Wallets: Connect your Web3 wallets for verification and cross-chain functionality.
settings.delegationHistoryDesc: This section displays your delegation history on the CPUNK platform. Delegations represent your contributions to the CPUNK ecosystem.
settings.noDelegationsFound: No delegations found for this wallet.
settings.participateToDelegate: Participate in the CPUNK ecosystem to start delegating.

settings.clickTelegramLink: Click the link to open our verification bot on Telegram
settings.sendDnaToBot: Send your DNA nickname to the bot when asked
settings.returnAndReload: Once verified, return to this page and reload

about.title: About CPUNK
about.intro: Welcome to the world of $CPUNK - Chip-Punk, the first Quantum-Safe MEME Coin in the world, built on the decentralized Cellframe blockchain.
about.mission: We are a community of innovators, enthusiasts, and visionaries who believe in the power of decentralization and the security of the future. $CPUNK is not just a MEME Coin: it's a movement, a celebration of advanced technology, and the strength of community. Together, we educate, empower, and develop the tools needed to secure the decentralized world for the quantum era.
about.missionItem0: Lead the charge in raising awareness about the looming "quantum apocalypse" and the urgent need for quantum-resistant blockchain technology.
about.missionItem1: Promote decentralization as a cornerstone of blockchain innovation.
about.missionItem2: Ensure absolute transparency and inclusivity for all our supporters.
about.missionItem3: Celebrate and empower our community through unique and memorable events.
about.transparencyDesc: Every decision, transaction, and use of funds is open to the community.
about.securityDesc: Thanks to Cellframe's Quantum-Safe technology, the future is protected.
about.communityDesc: Our strength lies in the people who support and drive the project forward.
about.councilIntro: The $CPUNK Council is a dedicated group of passionate community members who actively shape the future of our project. As we continue to grow, we're looking for more driven individuals to join us in making an impact!
about.councilBenefit1: Be Part of the Core Team â€“ Collaborate with current council members and gain deeper insights into upcoming developments.
about.councilBenefit2: Exclusive Beta Testing â€“ Be among the first to test new features and provide valuable feedback.
about.councilBenefit3: Right to Propose Changes â€“ As a council member, you gain the exclusive ability to draft and submit improvement proposals for DAO voting. This empowers you to directly shape the project's direction and drive meaningful changes within the $CPUNK ecosystem.
about.councilBenefit4: Voice Your Ideas â€“ Help shape proposals and actively participate in community votes.
about.councilBenefit5: Collaborate with Visionaries â€“ Join a community of committed and like-minded enthusiasts.
about.requirement1: Registered DNA â€“ Verify your identity within the $CPUNK ecosystem.
about.requirement2: 10M+ $CPUNK held â€“ Demonstrate your commitment to the project by holding a significant stake.
about.requirement3: Skills & Time â€“ We prioritize individuals who can actively contribute to $CPUNK's growth and vision.
about.joinCouncilCta: Join the Council and help shape the future of $CPUNK! Your involvement will have a direct impact on the project's direction and success. âœ¨
about.mascotSection: The Punk Chipmunk: A Symbol of Innovation
about.mascotDescription: Our punk chipmunk with its fiery red mohawk represents who we are: bold, resilient, and revolutionary. It embodies a vision that combines innovation and fun.
about.step1Desc: First, connect to your Cellframe Dashboard to verify your wallet.
about.step2Desc: Select a wallet with at least 10M CPUNK tokens.
about.step3Desc: Select your registered DNA to use for Council representation.
about.verificationSuccessDesc: Your wallet and DNA have been verified. An admin will review your application shortly.
about.verificationFailedDesc: Your wallet does not meet the minimum requirement of 10M CPUNK tokens.
about.needEligibleWallet: You need a wallet with at least 10M CPUNK tokens to apply for the Council.
about.reviewAndSubmit: Please review your information and click the button below to submit your application.
about.applicationSuccess: Success! Your application has been submitted. Thank you for applying to the CPUNK Council!
about.applicationError: Error! There was a problem submitting your application. Please try again later or contact support.

pages.homeTitle: CPUNK - Quantum-Safe MEME Coin | Built on Cellframe
pages.homeDescription1: - The world's first Quantum-Safe MEME Coin built on the Cellframe blockchain. We combine the fun of meme culture with cutting-edge quantum-resistant technology.
pages.homeDescription2: - Join our community of innovators, enthusiasts, and visionaries who believe in the power of decentralization and quantum-safe security.
pages.delegateWelcome: Stake your tokens on Cellframe networks to participate in ecosystem governance and earn rewards. Your delegation helps secure the network and supports the community.
pages.votingWelcome: Welcome to the CPUNK community voting system. Here you can participate in governance decisions and help shape the future of the CPUNK ecosystem.
pages.votingDescription: Your token-weighted vote directly influences key decisions and project development. Connect your Cellframe wallet to view active proposals and cast your votes.
pages.proposalsWelcome: Welcome to the CPUNK Improvement Proposals (CIPs) system. Here you can review official proposals for improving the CPUNK ecosystem and view governance results.
pages.proposalsDescription: CIPs allow community members to formally propose changes to the protocol, governance, or ecosystem features. Each proposal goes through review and voting processes.
pages.proposalsNote: Note: You can browse all proposals without connecting to the dashboard. Dashboard connection is only required when you wish to cast a vote on active proposals.
pages.boardWelcome: A public space for the CPUNK community to share thoughts, ideas, and updates.
pages.lookupWelcome: Search the CPUNK network for addresses, transactions, DNA nicknames, and more.
pages.lookupIntro: DNA (Distributed Naming & Addressing) provides a way to associate friendly nicknames with wallet addresses on the Cellframe blockchain.
pages.lookupDescription: Use this page to look up information about a registered nickname or wallet address.
pages.helpText: Enter a DNA nickname (e.g., 'cpunk') or a wallet address
pages.settingsWelcome: Manage your CPUNK platform preferences and account settings.
pages.ssoDescription: Connect your PQ wallet to access the CPUNK platform. Your DNA identity will be used for authentication across all platform features.
pages.networkChooseOs: Choose your operating system and copy the installation command to your terminal.
pages.whitepaperDescription: Official documentation for the world's first Quantum-Safe MEME Coin built on the Cellframe blockchain. This whitepaper outlines the vision, tokenomics, governance model, and roadmap for the CPUNK ecosystem.

eventDescription.location: Thrilled to announce the winning location for our Cellframe Mainnet Birthday bash: "The Post-Quantum Ark" in ISTANBUL! July 12th, 2025!
eventDescription.teams: Join the teams from CPUNK, QEVM, NODE.sys, KelVPN, DotFlat & the Cellframe team!

reservation.title: Reserve Your Spot
reservation.info: Secure your attendance by reserving with 1,000,000 CPUNK on the Backbone network.
reservation.loginRequired: Please login to reserve your spot at the Cellframe Mainnet Birthday Bash.
reservation.alreadyReserved: ðŸŽ‰ Reservation Confirmed! You're all set for the Cellframe Mainnet Birthday Bash.

rules.header: Here's how to secure your place:
rules.dnaLinked: DNA-Linked Reservation: Connect with your registered DNA to reserve.
rules.cpunkCommitment: CPUNK Commitment: Reserving your spot requires locking 1,000,000 CPUNK. This CPUNK will be securely held until the party on July 12th and fully refunded to attendees.
rules.reward: Reward for Attendance: If you book your spot and join us at the celebration, you will receive your 1,000,000 CPUNK deposit back PLUS a reward of 10%, totaling 1,100,000 CPUNK! Consider it a thank you for your commitment.
rules.noShow: No-Show Consideration: If you book but can't attend, your 1,000,000 CPUNK deposit will be returned minus a 10% no-show fee (you'll receive 900,000 CPUNK).
rules.oneWallet: One Wallet, One Reservation: For an accurate headcount, only one reservation per wallet is permitted. Use a separate wallet for each family member or friend.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.paragraph1: ChipPunk (CPUNK) is a community-driven meme token built on the Cellframe blockchain. It addresses common concerns of early-stage blockchain projectsâ€”inequitable token distribution, stealth development funds, and large investor dominanceâ€”by ensuring 100% community ownership. All CPUNK tokens enter the market transparently, without any developer or VC allocations.
section1.paragraph2: This approach fosters organic growth and trust by allowing community members to shape the project's direction through open governance and a fair token release schedule. By operating on Cellframe's quantum-safe network, CPUNK aligns community-driven principles with cutting-edge blockchain infrastructure.
section1.paragraph3: Cellframe offers a quantum-resistant architecture designed to thwart emerging threats posed by quantum computing. Its scalable Global Database (GDB) underpins CPUNK's token economy and ensures users can transact, vote, and interact securely well into the quantum era. CPUNK takes advantage of Cellframe's DEX for transparent price discovery and seamless token trades.

section2.title: 2. Tokenomics & Distribution
section2.paragraph1: CPUNK will launch on the Cellframe DEX in 10 distinct orders, each representing 10% of the total supply (100M tokens/order). The initial order is set at 1 CPUNK = 0.0001 CELL, with subsequent orders priced 10% higher than the previous.
section2.paragraph2: By releasing two orders per week over five weeks, the entire 1B supply will be distributed, ensuring a fair entry for early participants, transparent incremental price discovery, and a steady flow of tokens to the market.
section2.paragraph3: A significant portion of proceeds from CPUNK's token distribution will fund the first Cellframe community party on July 12, 2025â€”scheduled to celebrate the Cellframe mainnet's birthday. The event is capped at 1,000 attendees, each required to hold at least 1 million CPUNK to participate, with free entrance, food, and drinks.

section3.title: 3. Governance Model
section3.paragraph1: CPUNK embraces decentralized decision-making with a system wherein any holder above a set threshold can submit proposals. During the defined voting window, token holders vote in proportion to their holdings. Proposals that pass are executed on-chain (once Cellframe fully supports complex smart contracts), ensuring trustless implementation.
section3.paragraph2: All critical financial and developmental decisions reside on-chain, tied to immutable smart contracts. CPUNK's open-source codebase welcomes ongoing review and collaboration from the community, reinforcing its commitment to accountability and collective governance.

section4.title: 4. Conclusion
section4.paragraph1: ChipPunk (CPUNK) demonstrates the power of a wholly community-driven token in a rapidly advancing blockchain ecosystem. By aligning fair, transparent distribution with quantum-resistant security, CPUNK exemplifies best practices in decentralized finance and community building.
section4.paragraph2: Join us in celebrating blockchain innovation and shaping the future of quantum-safe digital economies. Stay tuned for the inaugural CPUNK-driven Cellframe community party on July 12, 2025â€”a real-world event marking Cellframe's mainnet birthday and a landmark occasion for the entire CPUNK community.
